articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Premiere Given by Ministry of People's Security
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Premiere Given by Ministry of People's Security
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a premiere given by the newly-organized Song and Dance Ensemble of the Ministry of People's Security.
					 Artistes of the ensemble put on the stage chorus "Please Receive Our Salute", mixed duet and chorus "February Is Spring", female quartet and chorus "Our Country Is Witnessing Changes" and oungum ensemble "The General Star Beyond the Clouds" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of their high honor and pride of living and struggling as staunch revolutionary soldiers of the Party and the leader and protectors of the people under the loving care of Kim Jong Il. They, at the same time, fully demonstrated the might of the interior forces which have firmly defended the outpost of the class struggle and reliably protected the gains of the socialist country and the people's security, glorifying the tradition of devotedly defending the leader over the last more than six decades. 
					
					 They successfully represented the unshakable faith and will of the people's security men to defend the best socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK as firm as a rock by always breathing the same breath with Kim Jong Il and sharing idea, will and destiny with him and creditably discharging the honorable mission as the first-line contingent of the class struggle and the interior forces of the Party. 
					
					  He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience, congratulating the performers on their successful performance.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the ensemble staged a splendid performance popular in its contents and replete with the spirit of the times with favorite songs loved by the people. He highly appreciated their successful presentation and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for performing activities, expressing expectation and belief that the ensemble would creditably perform their honorable mission and duty as buglers in the era of Songun by powerfully arousing the popular masses to the revolution and construction through their dynamic revolutionary and militant art activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek and Kang Nung Su and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of People's Security, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the ministry, and other commanding officers of the ministry.

articles.title: Meetings Held in Different Provinces
articles.content:
Meetings Held in Different Provinces
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in different provinces to vow to carry thorough the joint calls issued by the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea in the run-up to the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Attending there were leading officials of the local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the joint calls which comprehensively clarify militant tasks for building a great prosperous and powerful nation serve as a militant banner encouraging all the servicepersons and people in their high-pitched drive for winning a final victory once again.
					
					 The joint calls represent the Party's will to provide the people of the DPRK with all sorts of well-being, they noted.
					
					 They called on all fields and units to dash ahead like the wind at the new Chollima speed, "Huichon Speed" in the era of Songun, racing against the time in an effort to surpass the peak production year.
					
					They underscored the need to bring about a great leap forward, great innovations in production and construction, remaining true to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, and thus glorify this year as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country and a year of prosperity when the people will enjoy great happiness.

articles.title: Triplets Born at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Triplets Born at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Male triplets were born at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital recently.
					 Their mother is Ko Un Sim, a resident of Chongjin City.
					
					 Since she was admitted into the hospital after being diagnosed in October last year, she has been taken good care of by the medical team made up of competent doctors. She has been provided with a lot of tonic and medicines.
					
					 She could easily deliver the triplets thanks to the utmost sincerity of doctors and nurses.
					
					 The conditions of the triplets now in incubators and their mother are very good.

articles.title: S. Korean Group's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Snubbed
articles.content:
S. Korean Group's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Snubbed
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Recently the clan of the "Grand National Party" railroaded the so-called "bill on north Korean human rights" through the "Committee for Foreign Affairs and Trade and Unification" of the puppet National Assembly amid the walk-out of lawmakers from opposition parties.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 As part of their desperate campaign to do harm to fellow countrymen the south Korean conservatives cooked up even the "law on north Korean human rights" in a bid to kick up a more persistent and vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. This is an outright declaration of confrontation with the army and people of the DPRK and a declaration of a war. 
					
					  It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has not so far criticized the poor human rights record in south Korea, prompted by its desire to bring earlier independent reunification through the improved inter-Korean relations and the promotion of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The conservative group in south Korea, the worst human rights abusers, have neither qualification nor justification to talk about someone's "human rights."  The noisy anti-DPRK "human rights" row kicked up by them, though they have failed to settle their own problems, is nothing but a product of their sinister scenario to get rid of their serious domestic political crisis, prolong their dirty remaining days and do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with their American master.
					
					 This is as foolish an act as pricking one's own eyes with one's own finger. The conservative group had better stop the above-said ruckus, bearing this in mind. 
					
					 The confrontation maniacs can never go safe while recklessly hurting and defiling the inviolable system in the DPRK and the high dignity and rights of its people but will have to pay dearly for this. This is another warning served by them and by no means an empty talk.

articles.title: S. Korea's Redispatch to Afghanistan Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Redispatch to Afghanistan Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Civic and Public Organizations against the Move for Troop Re-dispatch to Afghanistan in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 18 in protest against the puppet authorities' move. 
					 The organization accused the "National Assembly" of working hard to take up and clear the "motion calling for re-dispatch of troops to Afghanistan." 
					
					 The "government" and conservative media of south Korea are pursuing the move for the re-dispatch of troops to Afghanistan while talking about "reconstruction" though it is becoming clear as the days go by that the Afghan war ignited by the U.S. is a war of genocide for its hegemony, held the organization.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. forces keep committing man-killings in the area to which south Korean troops are expected to dispatch, the organization warned that in case the re-dispatch of troops to the area is decided south Korea will not be able to escape international condemnation.
					
					 It demanded the authorities give up at once the above-said move.

articles.title: Stop to Projected Military Exercises Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Projected Military Exercises Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Independent Reunification of the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea made public a statement on Feb. 18 in denunciation of the plan of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers to stage war exercises targeted against the north.
					 The statement accused the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" of announcing it would stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises across south Korea from March 8 to 18.
					
					 This saber-rattling to be staged pursuant to the "OPLAN 5027" became the target of strong condemnation by the Koreans every year as it was clear in the aim to invade the north, it said, adding:
					
					 The bellicose forces are staging almost every day maneuvers for mounting a preemptive attack on the north, while paying-lip service to "peace." With nothing can they justify this saber-rattling.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop at once the exercises aiming at carrying out their scenarios for a war of aggression and scrap the "alliance" for aggression.

articles.title: Swedish Party Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Swedish Party Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Sweden issued a statement on Feb. 13 and Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, and Torstein Engelskjon, chairman of the Norway-Korea Friendship Society, published a joint statement on Feb. 15 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 The statement noted that the army and people of the DPRK have defended socialism from every move of the imperialists for aggression under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Communist Party of Sweden in the statement expressed full support for the Workers' Party Korea and the Korean people in their efforts to improve the people's standard of living by increasing production, realizing modernization and making scientific progress in industry and agriculture, protect the country from the U.S. imperialists' threats of war and nuclear weapons and reunify the country on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Dag Norum and Torstein Engelskjon in the joint statement praised Kim Jong Il as a genius of creation and construction who is ushering in a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation with the treasured sword of Songun, adding that his Songun leadership serves as a decisive factor which made it possible for the DPRK to bring about a new turning point in socialist construction and the stirring realities in which a thriving nation is emerging, weathering great difficulties and stern trials.
					
					It expressed belief that the Korean people would win only victories in their drive for safeguarding the socialist cause and building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and book and photo exhibitions were held in Laos, Cambodia, Romania and Kyrgyzstan between Feb. 9 and 11 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 On display at the venues were his works and photos on his undying feats and books and photos of the Korean people's struggle for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation and national reunification.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The director of the School of Politics and Theory of the Ministry of the Public Security of Laos said that the Korean people have achieved great successes in defending the country, building socialism and improving the people's standard of living under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding that this serves as precious experience for the Lao people.
					
					 The chairman of the External Relations Commission of the People's Party of Cambodia noted that the friendly and cooperative relations between his party and the Workers' Party of Korea are favorably developing day by day. The Cambodian people wish the Korean people greater successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification, he said.
					
					The chairman of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Il pursued Songun politics with the insight into the importance of army in carrying out the cause of independence, thereby developing the Korean People's Army into an invincible army, building a self-reliant defense industry and bringing about a great turning point in the building of a thriving nation with the efforts of all the people.
					
					The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party said that the Korean people will surely build a great prosperous and powerful nation thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks."
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Romania.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela and Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela and Nepal
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela and a printing house of Nepal each published in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" on Feb. 10.
					 This work, published on Sep. 5 Juche 97 (2008), says that the 60-year-long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory, gigantic creation and changes in which the Korean people protected the independence and honor of the country and built a rich, powerful and prosperous socialist country, weathering out the tempest of the revolution under the leadership of the great leader and party. It clarifies the idea that even a small and backward country can be a developed one of authority if it has a great leader and party.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks and ways to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and Songun.
